mapper.insert: insert into FOOD (FOOD_SEQ, FOOD_NAME, FOOD_PRICE) values (PK_FOOD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{foodName}, #{foodPrice})
mapper.select:
select a.FOOD_SEQ, a.FOOD_NAME, a.FOOD_PRICE from FOOD a
and a.FOOD_NAME like ('%'|| #{foodName}||'%')
and a.FOOD_PRICE like ('%'|| #{foodPrice}||'%')
order by a.FOOD_SEQ
select a.FOOD_SEQ, a.FOOD_NAME, a.FOOD_PRICE from FOOD a where a.FOOD_NAME = #{foodName} order by a.FOOD_SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOOD_ORDER (FOOD_ORDER_SEQ, FOOD_NAME, FOOD_PRICE, FOOD_CNT, USER_ID, ORDER_DATE) VALUES (PK_FOOD_ORDER_SEQ.nextval, #{foodName}, #{foodPrice}, #{foodCnt}, #{userId}, sysdate)
mapper.select:
select a.FOOD_ORDER_SEQ, a.FOOD_NAME, a.FOOD_PRICE, a.FOOD_CNT from FOOD_ORDER a where 1=1
and a.FOOD_NAME like ('%'|| #{foodName}||'%')
and a.FOOD_PRICE like ('%'|| #{foodPrice}||'%')
and a.user_ID = #{userId} order by a.FOOD_ORDER_SEQ
